code: import React from'react';import LanguageSwitcher from'./LanguageSwitcher';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=_ref=>{let{onLanguageChange,language}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:language==='ru'?'Электронный учебник по БЖЧ':'Electronic Textbook on БЖЧ'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LanguageSwitcher,{onLanguageChange:onLanguageChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/lectures",children:language==='ru'?'Лекции':'Lectures'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/quizzes",children:language==='ru'?'Тесты':'Quizzes'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/practices",children:language==='ru'?'Практические задания':'Practice Tasks'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/dictionary",children:language==='ru'?'Словарь':'Dictionary'})]})]});};export default Header;
